The video was published on Facebook on D: 2019, showing distressed children taking shelter in a bus with broken windows while adults comforted them.
The misleading Facebook post included a: language caption that falsely claimed the bus filled with school children came under attack in Seelampur.
Protests turned violent in Seelampur: Delhi on December 16, 2019, after the Indian government passed a new citizenship bill.
A reverse image search using InVID: a digital verification tool, found that the video had been circulating online since at least January 2018 in reports about a protest against the release of a Bollywood film in Gurugram city in Haryana, India.
